author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...JOYCE LIKELY TO WEAKEN DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
summary:
...JOYCE LIKELY TO WEAKEN DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
 As of 5:00 AM AST Sun Sep 29
 the center of Joyce was located near 21.3, -48.1
 with movement NW at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
